API pyNotes¶

Note¶

class package.api.note.Note(title='', content='', uuid=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Note class implements the note mechanics.

Attributes:

content (str): The note content. path (str): The note file path. title (str): The name of the note. uuid (str): The note universal unique identifier.

property content¶

The property to get the content of the note.

Returns

The content of the note.

Return type

str

delete()[source]¶

The function to delete the note.

Returns

False if the path of the note does not exists or True if the note is deleted.

Return type

bool

property path¶

The property to get the path of the note.

Returns

The path of the note.

Return type

str

save()[source]¶

The function to save the note.

package.api.note.get_notes()[source]¶

Create a list of Notes objects from all notes contained in notes directory.

Returns

The list of the notes objects saved in notes directory.

Return type

list
